cyclone.name: DELTA
cyclone.current_location: about 160 miles south of Cameron, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: moving northward and expected to arc north-northeast toward the southwest Louisiana coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: N/A – no watches south of Sargent, TX
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane Warning from High Island, TX eastward to Morgan City, LA; Tropical-Storm Warning from West of High Island to Sargent, TX
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central and southwest Louisiana coast and the upper Texas coast east of High Island
weather_observation.wind: Occasional tropical-storm-force gusts possible in outer rainbands, but sustained winds generally below gale force at the port
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor water level rise possible (less than 2 ft) due to long-period swell; significant surge not expected
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rainbands could drop 1–2 inches of rain, locally 3 inches
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents along Gulf beaches could affect marine traffic and small craft operations
